review: Awful, unwatchable, how do I send it back?
author: William Colvin

review: Was scared about the one star reviews that were claiming technical difficulties but am thoroughly impressed! I have a 6 Mbps internet service and this fire stick works flawlessly. I stream live tv with sling TV and it works great. I have had this product for only 3 days and hope it keeps working for a long time. The response time is amazing. Love this product, probably the most amazing electronic device I have ever witnessed.
author: Link48

review: Super slow and doesn't screencast well. Buy a Chromestick. we also have a Roku which seems to be more effective for streaming Amazon prime and Netflix. I bought this a few months ago and never use it.
author: Marisa

review: Does It work outside of the USA?  For example in South America,  Paraguay

review: Goodbye Netflix and hopefully soon Comcast when damn contract is over.  VERY PLEASED
author: Julie Bishop

review: Bought one of these and it didn't work. Upgraded my router and decided to give it another try. I am in love with it. Works wonderfully.
author: Josh

review: Does not work outside USA ,and this is not mention in the product description

review: Works well.  I only use it for Netflix, but that's enough.
